about_the_game:
In order to enjoy the content included in the Subscription Pass you will need to own the Planet Coaster base game.

Take your creativity to thrilling new heights with the Planet Coaster Subscription Pass! Subscribe now to access all 10 existing paid DLCs and complete your experience of the acclaimed Planet Coaster without buying each expansion and content pack separately. Build and design the ultimate coaster park with unparalleled attention to detail and manage it in a truly living world.

This subscription pass includes:

Classic Rides Collection

Includes nine new rides and coasters with one variant, including the Macchina Classica vintage roadster, Armada the water based boat ride, the graceful Sky Temple, plus more rides and coasters to help you build the park of your dreams!

Magnificent Rides Collection

Introduces nine new rides and coasters to the game, inspired by some of the most iconic attractions from fairgrounds and theme parks around the world. Expanding on the rich assortment of Planet Coaster rides, these new attractions allow you to thrill and delight your guests in all new ways

World’s Fair Pack

The World’s Fair Pack includes two new coasters, one new tracked ride, and adds 10 new themes based on a selection of countries; China, USA, France, Morocco, Italy, Germany, Japan, UK, Mexico, and Spain.

Vintage Pack

Includes two new coasters, five new rides, classic roofs and architecture, interactive vending machines, static and animated props, building props, lights and scenery, animated characters, fences, path extras, and character hats.

Studios Pack

Build the ultimate backlot tour and bring the blockbuster experience to life with spectacular stunts, dramatic effects and rides that put park guests in the heart of the action.

Adventure Pack

Create your own pyramids, temples, and other jungle structures. Lure your guests into ancient traps and have them encounter some truly scary creatures including crocodiles, hippos, or even mummies!

Spooky Pack

A theme so dark it rose from the grave! Embrace the spook-tacular new supernatural content in Planet Coaster, and thrill your guests with surprises lurking around every dark corner!

Knight Rider™ K.I.T.T. Construction Kit

Take a shadowy flight into Knight Rider™ K.I.T.T. Construction Kit for Planet Coaster. The Knight Rider™ K.I.T.T. Construction Kit features in-game replicas of K.I.T.T., K.I.T.T. in Super Pursuit mode, and the evil Knight Industries prototype K.A.R.R. with silver and black finish.

Back to the Future™ Time Machine Construction Kit

Features in-game replicas of the DeLorean Time Machine in its original 1985 form, and in its 2015, 1955 and 1885 variants, with optional standard tires, ‘hover’ wheels, white-rimmed classic tires, or railway wheels.

The Munsters® Munster Koach Construction Kit

Features in-game replicas of the Munster Koach and the DRAG-U-LA drag racer from The Munsters episode ‘Hot Rod Herman’ and the classic 1966 movie Munster, Go Home!"

legal_notice: Planet Coaster is a registered trademark of Frontier Developments plc. Planet Coaster © 2016 Frontier Developments plc. All rights reserved.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.14 (Mojave) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (4 cores)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card (AMD): Radeon R9 M290 | Video Card (NVIDIA): GeForce GTX 775M
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

name: Planet Coaster: Subscription Pass

package_groups.description: To be billed on a recurring basis.
package_groups.name: subscriptions

subs.option_description: $4.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $4.99 USD.
$13.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 3 month(s) at $13.99 USD.
$24.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 6 month(s) at $24.99 USD.

package_groups.title: Buy Planet Coaster: Subscription Pass Subscription Plan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-2300/AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 560 (2GB)/AMD Radeon 7850 (2GB)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)/8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770/AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 980 (4GB)/AMD R9 380 (4GB)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

price_overview.recurring_sub_desc: $4.99 USD at checkout, auto-renewed every 1 month(s) at $4.99 USD.

short_description: Take your creativity to thrilling new heights with the Planet Coaster Subscription Pass! Subscribe now to access all 10 existing paid DLCs and complete your experience of the acclaimed Planet Coaster without buying each expansion and content pack separately.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
